name: XPDL Module
summary: Learn about .XPDL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The XPDL format was standardized by the Workflow Management Coalition, a global organization of individuals and groups engaged in managing business workflow. Therefore, XPDL files may be supported by other BPM applications besides iProcess and Business Studio.

description: Business process created for TIBCO iProcess or Business Studio business process management (BPM) software; contains code written in XPDL, the XML Process Definition Language; includes one or more processes that can be added to a iProcess or Business Studio business model.
